website_summaries.verdict: Great for riding long distances and over hilly terrain, this admittedly pricey electric bike is a sturdy and comfortable ride that was built to last.
While this folding electric bike isn’t cheap, it is the best model available for tackling hilly roads and rough terrain, and it's at the top of its class as far as durability is concerned, too.
pros: An impressive top speed of 20 miles per hour
Powerful engine effortlessly handles steep inclines
cons: While its aluminum frame makes it more durable, this is a heavier folding electric bike

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited to recieve my bike after nothing but problems with my old gas one. Fired her up and rode 6miles first half was good then I started getting code 22and loosing throttle and assist. Finally made it home after 10-20 code 22 and put it on the charger. After a full charge it wont even turn on now (charger was green, battery indicator on battery is full) as soon as it turns on the battery indicator on handle bars goes from full to flashing dead in 5seconds. Very sad that my 1500$ bike wont work :(

product_meta.title: DJ Folding Bike 750W 48V 13Ah Power Electric Bicycle, Pearl White, LED Bike Light, Suspension Fork and Shimano Gear,
product_meta.description:
DJ Folding Bike is an all-purpose powerful electric bike built with high-quality mainstream components. 
The bike is powerful, affordable, durable, quiet, clean looking, easy to use and can bring you tons of fun! 
This performs perfectly through the city or on light off-road trails with an integrated headlight and suspension to absorb shocks. 
Whether you are a commuter, senior, casual rider or sports fan, this is the bike built for everyone. 
The 48V LG battery can be dismounted and charged anywhere on the go with a safety design to prevent over-charged. 
Enjoy scenery without sweating while saving money is the best combination. You can get them all on this zero-emission DJ Bikes. 



Specifications

 *  Motor: Bafang brushless 750W motor with peak power of 1000W
 *  Battery: LG lithium 48V 13Ah dismountable with key lock 
 * Frame: Aluminum frame
 *  Brakes: Tektro Disc 
 *  Suspension: Mozo fork, preload adjustment and lockout
 * User Control: King Meter LCD
 * Tires: Kenda All-purpose 20”x 4” 
 * Rims: Heavy duty alloy rims 20” (50.8 cm) 
 * Seat: Extra comfortable cushion saddle 
 * Racks: Front & rear cargo racks included 
 * Rear Cassette: Shimano 7 Gears
 * Weight: 57 lb. (26 kg) 
 *  Power Assisted Speed: Legal speed limit 20 mph (32 km/h) 



Why DJ Bikes?

 * We offer competitive pricing. 
 * We offer free & fast shipping.
 *  Bikes are durable and serviceable to any repair shop.
 * We offer 1 year warranty. Quality is endorsed.



You will not find a better deal on a high-performance low-cost ebike anywhere.
